SELECT DISTINCT t1.ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, t1.NAME_ AS formName, t1.TENANT_ID_ AS systemSn, t1.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, t1.START_TIME_ AS startTime, t1.END_TIME_ AS endTime, (CASE WHEN t1.END_TIME_ IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) AS status, (CASE WHEN (t3.`SUSPENSION_STATE_` = 2 OR t5.`SUSPENSION_STATE_` =2) THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) AS suspensionState, t4.`prefix_url` AS prefixUrl, t4.`approval_type` AS approvalType, t4.`apply_type` AS applyType, t2.ID_ AS starterId, t2.FIRST_ as starter FROM act_hi_procinst t1 LEFT JOIN act_id_user t2 ON t1.START_USER_ID_ = t2.ID_ LEFT JOIN `act_re_procdef` t3 ON t1.`PROC_DEF_ID_` = t3.`ID_` LEFT JOIN `bpm_task_from` t4 ON t4.`process_definition_key` = t1.`PROC_DEF_ID_` LEFT JOIN act_ru_execution t5 ON t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t5.PROC_INST_ID_ where 1 = 1 and t1.START_USER_ID_ = #{start_userId} and t2.FIRST_ like CONCAT('%',#{start_name},'%') and t1.NAME_ like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and ${sql_filter}
